verse: विज्ञानमानन्दं ब्रह्म रातेर्दतुः परायणम् । सर्वसंकल्पसंन्यासचेतसा यत्परिग्रहः ॥

terms.रातेः: (from) of the one who delights, enjoys
terms.परायणम्: the ultimate refuge, the highest goal
terms.सर्वसंकल्पसंन्यासचेतसा: with a mind that has renounced all desires

meaning: Meaning: The verse states that the Absolute, or the Divine, is the ultimate refuge and source of bliss and knowledge. It is the goal that brings true happiness and fulfillment. To attain this, one needs to renounce all desires and attachments.
